Let's Go

Transportation Car Gate Tickets

If you are a travel enthusiast, you will be traveling on weekends. If you are a busy person, you will be traveling for office work. You need to get a car ticket.

Overview & Challenge

You do not want to go to the bus station to pick up your address card. You do not want to go to the bus stop to ask for a ticket.

Easily find the bus stops and phone numbers by simply installing the app below on your phone and selecting the route you want to take.

Project Summary

  • App Info The file size is just 3 mb and it should be convenient (there are more than 170 bus terminals. You have bus station address cards which are not included in this app. If you want to add more, you can send it by comment or chatbox)

  • Download Click the link below to download Playstore: http://bit.ly/mmBus For those who do not have a playstore, http://bit.ly/mmBusV1
